high_descs: turn around, walk towards the wall
pick up the blue towel from the floor
turn to the right, walk forward, turn right, walk forward to the desk, hold the towel up
anns.task_desc: examine a towel with a lamp

high_descs: Turn left and take a step then turn left and walk to the blue cloth on the floor.
Pick up the blue cloth that's in front of you.
Turn around and walk to the light that's on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a cloth by lamp light.

high_descs: Move across the room to the blue napkin sitting on the floor across from the green trash bin
Pick up the blue napkin on the floor
Carry the blue napkin to the desk lamp on the desk to the right of the bed
anns.task_desc: Carry a napkin while turning on a lamp
